title: Bi-Weekly Movies, TV Shows, Documentaries & Podcasts Discussion Thread
selftext:
So, what is r/India watching of late?

Watched any premieres yesterday? Loved any movie that you saw recently and are dying to discuss it? Discovered any new series lately? Well, this is your space. Go crazy!

This is not just limited to Hollywood/Bollywood, nor to any particular language.

Feel free to share short films, or podcasts of your choice, too, and ask for recommendations for what to watch!

**Movies and Shows Thread is posted every two weeks on Saturday mornings |** [**Old Threads**](https://reddit.com/r/india/search?q=Movies+thread+discussion+&restrict_sr=on&sort=new&t=all)

https://preview.redd.it/e3cqi5nuw8n61.png?width=1487&format=png&auto=webp&v=enabled&s=ae6b7a10fa3272821e9904431dab0b993b36aae7
comments: Morty i already told you.they are not your family.they are clones from an alternate reality possessed by demonic alien spirits from another dimension ðŸ˜‚ðŸ˜‚ damn i love this show

Saw Cocaine Bear. 

Dumb, silly, gory and ridiculous. Passable vfx. Anticlimactic. Nevertheless, one terrific action scene made it worth the money :)

Started season 1 of Peep Show. Goddamn how did I miss out on this gem. Jesse Armstrong is on of the writers. I have never laughed out loud so much in one episode. 

Will start a re-watch of  succession before the season 4 premiere. I'm having contradictory feelings towards the final 4th season. I love it and I want to watch it as long as possible and I also love that they will end as per the showrunner and the writers vision and almost definitely  end on a bang.
Is Peep Show back on any streaming service? Watched it ages ago in Netflix.
I thought American Vandal and Dirk Gently's Holistic Detective Agency were underrated and did not deserve to be cancelled by Netflix

Thankam - very good thriller


Nanpakal nerathu mayakkam - okay movie brilliant performances, brilliant cinematography and brilliant use of bgm


Kala - non stop action, terrific cinematography, editing and stunt choreography

All Malayalam movies

> Peep Show

where can i watch it?
Had to resort to the high seas my friend. I  could not find it anywhere.
